lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Charlie Puth/Selena Gomez
[00:00.727] 作曲 : Charlie Puth/Selena Gomez
[00:01.454]双笙：We don't talk anymore
[00:03.454]囧菌：We don't talk anymore
[00:05.954]合：We don't talk anymore
[00:07.454]Like we used to do
[00:10.704]囧菌：We don't love anymore
[00:13.205]双笙：What was all of it for
[00:15.155]合：Oh we don't talk anymore
[00:17.155]Like we used to do
[00:20.155]囧菌：I just heard you found the one you've been lookin'
[00:23.655]You've been lookin' for
[00:26.155]I wish I would have known that wasn't me
[00:29.904]Cuz even after all this time I still wonder
[00:33.155]Why I can't move on
[00:35.905]Just the way you did so easily
[00:39.905]双笙：Don't wanna know
[00:41.406]What kinda dress you're wearin' tonight
[00:44.155]If he's holdin' onto you so tight
[00:46.406]The way I did before
[00:49.655]囧菌：I overdosed
[00:51.155]Should've known your love was a game
[00:53.405]Now I can't get you out of my brain
[00:55.905]Oh it's such a shame
[00:58.655]We don't talk anymore
[01:00.905]双笙：We don't talk anymore
[01:03.405]合：We don't talk anymore
[01:04.656]Like we used to do
[01:08.406]双笙：We don't love anymore
[01:10.656]囧菌：What was all of it for
[01:12.598]合：Oh we don't talk anymore
[01:15.349]Like we used to do
[01:17.849]双笙：I just hope you're lyin' next to somebody
[01:21.349]Who knows how to love you like me
[01:23.849]There must be a good reason that you're gone
[01:27.600]Every now and then I think you
[01:29.285]Might want me to come show up at your door
[01:33.482]But I'm just too afraid that I'll be wrong
[01:37.482]囧菌：Don't wanna know
[01:39.231]If you're lookin' into her eyes
[01:41.481]If she's holdin' onto you so tight
[01:43.981]The way I did before
[01:47.232]双笙：I overdosed
[01:48.732]Should've known your love was a game
[01:51.232]Now I can't get you out of my brain
[01:53.732]Oh it's such a shame
[01:56.232]合：We don't talk anymore
[01:58.482]We don't talk anymore
[02:01.167]We don't talk anymore
[02:02.669]Like we used to do
[02:06.168]We don't love anymore
[02:08.418]What was all of it for
[02:10.668]Oh we don't talk anymore
[02:12.369]Like we used to do
[02:18.119]囧菌：Like we used to do
[02:35.120]双笙：Don't wanna know
[02:36.870]What kinda dress you're wearin' tonight
[02:39.119]If he's givin' it to you just right
[02:41.619]The way I did before
[02:44.619]囧菌：I overdosed
[02:46.369]Should've known your love was a game
[02:48.619]Now I can't get you out of my brain
[02:51.119]合：Oh it's such a shame
[02:53.870]We don't talk anymore
[02:56.369]We don't talk anymore
[02:58.619]We don't talk anymore
[03:00.369]Like we used to do
[03:03.369]We don't love anymore
[03:05.869]What was all of it for
[03:08.369]Oh we don't talk anymore
[03:09.619]Like we used to do
[03:13.567]双笙：We don't talk anymore
[03:15.499]囧菌：What kinda dress you're wearin' tonight
[03:16.999]双笙：Oh
[03:17.999]囧菌：If he's holdin' onto you so tight

[03:20.249]双笙：The way I did before
[03:23.249]囧菌：We don't talk anymore
